tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
One of my molar tooth was aching, I visited a dentist nearby. He told that tooth requires root canal treatment but it was a tricky tooth and needed a specialist to do it. I researched and looked for the best Endodontist near my area that is Dwarka
 I came to know about Dr Shivani Mangal. I visited her, she took the x-ray and explained me the procedure and assured that it can definitely be done but might require two or three sittings as it was a difficult tooth to treat on. She completed the treatment in two sittings that too in a very comfortable manner. Thank you so much Dr Shivani.
reply_text: Thank you so much Shubham for giving such a wonderful feedback. We always try our best to save the natural tooth for as long as possible and you have been very patient following all the instructions during the whole procedure. All the very best for future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My aunt had discolored upper front teeth. She wanted some quick solution for them as she had a family function in a month. I have known Dr Shivani Mangal for long and was sure she would definitely give the best treatment. so I took my aunt to her. Taking into account the duration that we had, Doctor recommended to go for smile designing for her six front teeth that would include a combination of veneers and crowns. Within three weeks, I could see my aunt flaunting her new and bright smile. *** *** ****** *** **** ** ********
reply_text: Thank you so much sakshi mam for visiting us . understanding the patientâ€™s needs and creating beautiful smiles is what we always aim for . thanks for placing your trust in us . take care.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had severe pain in my tooth last night all of a sudden. I really could not sleep for the whole night. I searched for a doctor on practo and I booked an appointment with Dr Shivani Mangal. The very first thing I did in the morning was visiting her. She told that the tooth needs to get a root canal treatment done. I had heard about RCT and was really scared about it, but she calmed me down telling that it would be very comfortable, and as she said the treatment was really comfortable. My pain was relieved and I was almost normal within two to three days. Thank you so much Dr Shivani. She also advised to get a routine checkup done to avoid such experience in future and I really do know now the importance of oral health because I do not want to experience that pain again. I am going to visit her every 6 months. *** ** ****** *** **** *********** ** *******
reply_text: Thank you so much Saloni for believing in me. I still remember the day you visited in so much pain in your tooth. I could see nothing but just to relieve you of the pain. Take care.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Shivani Mangal
I knew I had many issues with my teeth but couldn't prioritise. Now, I had to visit a dentist and get them fixed. Found Dr Shivani Mangal online and visited her. She listened to my problems patiently and then checked my teeth. So it was an extensive kind of treatment including few RCTs followed by capping and then extraction of two or three teeth. Things were pretty clear in my mind. I told her to start the treatment. I was a bit skeptical as the past root canal treatments were not that comfortable for me but she assured me that I would be very comfortable and yes it was the same. The treatment is still going on but believe me I am not at all scared of visiting that dental clinic. Thank you so much Dr Shivani.
reply_text: Thank you Kanika for being such a wonderful patient. Take care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Never did I know that dental pain could be so agonising. I could not sleep from literally 3 days. I booked an appointment at Cusp Dental and visited there. Dr Shivani examined me and told that the tooth was badly decayed and required root canal treatment. I was in so much pain I just told her to start the treatment and relieve me of the pain. Believe me after the first sitting itself I was much much relieved of the pain that I could sleep nicely. The treatment went on very smoothly. I also got capping done for that tooth. Thank you so much Dr Shivani
reply_text: Thank you Pranay for such a wonderful feedback. We are glad to have been able to relieve you of the agonising toothache.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: All of sudden I developed toothache, after recommendation from my friend who herself underwent Root Canal Treatment from Dr. Shivani I booked an appointment. Dr. Shivani explained whole procedure pertinent to my problem and I was soon  in for ROOT CANAL. She treated my problem  with such a finesse that I was in awe of her capability and highly recommend her as Root Canal Specialist. Clinic atmosphere was friendly with great sterilization facilities. Cusp Dental is a great haven for all your tooth problems.
reply_text: Thank you Madhu Ma'am for such a wonderful feedback. You have been an amazing patient to treat on. Take care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very fond of sweets. Everyone says I have sweet tooth. Lesser I knew this will get me into trouble some day. I was not able to eat anything sweet due to sensitivity. Visited Dr Shivani Mangal. She examined my teeth and instantly said that I will have to stop eating sweets. I had multiple cavities that need to be filled and one tooth needed root canal treatment. I could now understand the importance of healthy teeth when I was not able to eat comfortably. I wanted to get them fixed. She did the whole treatment very efficiently. I will suggest everyone to get their teeth checked and get them treated in time. Thank you Dr Shivani.
reply_text: Thank you Parveen for such a wonderful feedback. Not everyone is so true and honest in admitting their habits and all ready to modify them for their health. Take care!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Shivani Mangal for my smile correction (came to know it is known as smile designing). She treated six of my upper front teeth. The whole procedure took 4 appointments, within a span of 3 weeks. I can't believe I have a completely new and beautiful smile. Wish I had visited her before.
reply_text: Thank you Arushi for such a wonderful feedback.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was felling some discomfort in my tooth. Dr Shivani Mangal did x ray and told that RCT followed by a minor surgical procedure known as apicoectomy will be needed. The treatment was done the very next day as i was short of time. Great team work by the doctors.
reply_text: Thank you Neha for visiting us.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I had multiple silver fillings in my teeth. Got them in my childhood. Never thought of getting them replaced nor did they trouble me. But recently, came to know about mercury toxicity due to silver fillings. Went to Dr Shivani Mangal to enquire about the same. She explained the hazards of silver fillings and advised to get them replaced with composite tooth colored laser fillings. Got them done from her. Commendable work. Thank you so much Dr Shivani.
reply_text: Thank you Swapnil for believing in us . mercury toxicity something that not many patients are aware of , appreciate the away that you had.

review: I had gap in my upper front teeth. Though it was there since childhood, but now I started feeling conscious and wanted to get it rectified. Dr Shivani Mangal gave me options like composite filling, veneers and crowns. But she also recommended to go for the most conservative or least invasive option for now. So She gave an appointment for the composite filling. I got the filling done. She told that if the filling gets chipped off again again, then other options will have to be done. Its almost an year. The filling is absolutely intact and natural. Kudos DrShivani.
reply_text: Thank you for placing your trust in us. We always recommend to go for conservative treatment to save more tooth structure.
